byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and WILLIAM NEUMAN

abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio's calm, confident response to bombing in Chelsea earns him praise and could make his election rivals think twice about taking him on; critics of mayor say his handling of attack probably won't convince skeptical voters of his management skills.

headline.print_headline: Facing Crisis With Calm, De Blasio Wins Praise
headline.main: After Bombing, a Crucial Test for Mayor de Blasio, and a Calm Response

snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio has had his share of stumbles and political sideshows, but he has won praise for his handling of the bombing on Saturday in Manhattan....
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio has had his share of stumbles and political sideshows, but he has won praise for his handling of the bombing on Saturday in Manhattan.
